name: Onfly
tagline: A fast and easy info system for mobile
body:
##Onfly version 1.0
> is a light solution to share infos, messages, suggestions, skills or dictionaries; you can use it in your LAN or in Internet.

* A light interface provides small suggestions, phone numbers and links on your smartphone or tablet. 
* An easy admin back-end (built on top of https://code.google.com/p/phpliteadmin/) helps to manage your messages.

The code is HTML5 with [jQueryMobile](http://jquerymobile.com/) and [PHP](http://php.net/), the database used is [SQlite](http://www.sqlite.org/).

Alfredo Cosco - orazio.nelson@gmail.com - www.nelsonweb.it

Released under [GPL v2](http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html)
